title: Help with this font please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417210600im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GLOBALHEADER2_5439.png)

I need help identifying this font that a friend sent me to recreate their logo .. The closest I found was Herculanum, but it is not an exact match Thank you for any help in advance
author: tprphoto
